page.title: 18A Day In My Life
page.content:
I get up at 8:00 in the morning and go downstairs. I have my breakfast (Readybreak) and then go back upstairs and wash. Then I go downstairs and brush my hair. By now it's a mad rush for the bus which comes at 8:30 we get up to the top of the drive and wait normaly it is late it comes eventualy. At about 8:45 we come in to school and do maths from 8:50 to 10:35. Then we go out to play . We come in at 10:55 and do creative writing until 12:00 then we go to singing, with Mrs Ellis. We sing songs out of books like Jolly Herring, Sing Together and Alleluia. At 12:30 we have our dinner and we go out to play. Dinner play finishes at 1:15 when we come in we do anthology to 2:00. At 2:15 we do Enviromental Studies that lasts to 3:15 it's home time now.
MARK WILSON
